name: Monster Chase (ishaanmalhotra)
description:
Hi  everyone

My name is Ishaan Malhotra I have developed this game using Unity game engine

Game name  MONSTER CHASE

Game details

A very simple game in which the enemies will come from right and left you have to dodge the enemies by jumping . There are two characters in my game

controls 

right and left arrow keys to move right and left . Space to jump 

my personal details

I am Inspired by my father he encouraged me a  lot to make games and now my dream is to be a game developer . I hope you will play this game and enjoy and a happy new year. 

Bye bye everyone
